name: Hearts & Aces
description:
AVAILABLE NOW ON GOOGLE PLAY AND THE APP STORE!!!!!

The year is 2192.

Earth is under attack by a mysterious extraterrestrial force!!!

Fend off the alien threat with a pool of 10 available fighters!!!

FEATURES:

-Switch between fighters in your squadron mid battle

-10 fighter planes to choose from

-12 Stage Arcade mode

-3 Boss Stages

-Endless Survival Mode

-Hip Hop soundtrack featuring: Mantis Arms, Columbo Coulda Killed You, and Harry The Archfiend

@harry_arches

@ImperialBodega

https://soundcloud.com/imperial-bodega
